Verses: 1 aagaiyaal, Megampondra Iththanai Thiralaana Saatchigal Nammai Soozhndhukondirukka, Baaramaana Yaavatraiyum, Nammai Sutri Nerungi Nirkira Paavaththaiyum Thallivittu, Visuvaasaththai Thuvakkugiravarum Mudikkiravarumaayirukkira Yesuvai Nokki, Namakku Niyamiththirukkira Ottaththil Porumaiyode Odakkadavom;
2 avar Thamakkumun Vaiththirundha Sandhoshaththinporuttu, Avamaanaththai Ennaamal, Siluvaiyai Sagiththu, Dhevanudaiya Singaasanaththin Valadhupaarisaththil Veetrirukkiraar.

3 aagaiyaal Neengal Ilaippullavargalaai Ungal Aaththumaakkalil Sorndhupogaadhapadikku, Thamakku Virodhamaai Paavigalaal Seyyappatta Ivvidhamaana Vibareedhangalai Sagiththa Avaraiye Ninaiththukkollungal
4 paavaththirku Virodhamaai Poraadugiradhil Raththanjsindhappadaththakkadhaaga Neengal Innum Edhirththunirkavillaiye.
5 andriyum: En Magane, Karththarudaiya Sitchaiyai Arpamaaga Ennaadhe, Avaraal Kadindhukollappadumpodhu Sorndhupogaadhe.

6 karththar Evanidaththil Anbukoorugiraaro Avanai Avar Sitchiththu, Thaam Serththukkollugira Endha Maganaiyum Thandikkiraar Endru Pillaigalukku Sollugiradhupola Ungalukku Solliyirukkira Buththimadhiyai Marandheergal.
7 neengal Sitchaiyai Sagikkiravargalaayirundhaal Dhevan Ungalai Buththiraraaga Enni Nadaththugiraar; Thagappan Sitchiyaadha Puththiranundo?
8 ellaarukkum Kidaikkum Sitchai Ungalukku Kidaiyaadhirundhaal Neengal Puththiraraayiraamal Vesippillaigalaayiruppeergale.

9 andriyum, Nammudaiya Sareeraththin Thagappanmaargal Nammai Sitchikkumpodhu, Avargalukku Naam Anji Nadandhirukka, Naam Pizhaikkaththakkadhaaga Aavigalin Pidhaavukku Vegu Adhigamaai Adangi Nadakkavendumallavaa?

10 avargal Thangalukku Nalamendru Thondrinapadi Konjakkaalam Sitchiththaargal; Ivaro Thammudaiya Parisuththaththukku Naam Pangullavarkalaagumporuttu Nammudaiya Pirayojanaththukkaagave Nammai Sitchikkiraar.
11 endha Sitchaiyum Tharkaalaththil Sandhoshamaai Kaanaamal Thukkamaai Kaanum; Aagilum Pirkaalaththil Adhil Pazhaginavargalukku Adhu Needhiyaagiya Samaadhaana Balanai Tharum.
12 aagaiyinaal, Negizhndha Kaigalaiyum Thalarndha Muzhangaalgalaiyum Neengal, Thirumba Nimirththi,
13 mudamaayirukkiradhu Pisagippogaamal Sosthamaagumpadikku, Ungal Paadhangalukku Vazhigalai Sevvaippaduththungal.
14 yaavarodum Samaadhaanamaayirukkavum, Parisuththamullavargalaayirukkavum Naadungal; Parisuththamillaamal Oruvanum Karththarai Dharisippadhillaiye.
15 oruvanum Dhevanudaiya Kirubaiyai Izhandhupogaadhapadikkum Yaadhoru Kasappaana Ver Mulaiththezhumbi Kalakkamundaakkugiradhinaal Anegar Theettuppadaadhapadikkum,
16 oruvanum Vesikkallanaagavum, Oruvelai Pojanaththukkaaga Than Seshtabuththirapaagaththai Vitruppotta Esaavaippola Seerkettavanaagavum Iraadhapadikkum Echcharikkaiyaayirungal.

17 enendraal, Pirpaadu Avan Aaseervaadhaththai Sudhandhariththukkolla Virumbiyum Aagaadhavanendru Thallappattadhai Ariveergal; Avan Kanneervittu, Kavalaiyode Thediyum Manam Maarudhalai Kaanaamarponaan.
18 andriyum, Thodakkoodiyadhum, Akkini Patriyerigiradhumaana Malaiyinidaththirkum, Mandhaaram Irul Perungaatru Aagiya Ivaigalinidaththirkum,

19 ekkaala Muzhakkaththinidaththirkum, Vaarththaigaludaiya Saththaththinidaththirkum, Neengal Vandhu Seravillai; Andha Saththaththai Kettavargal Pinnum Thangalukku Vaarththai Sollappadaadhapadikku Vendikkondaargal.
20 enenil Oru Mirugamaagilum Malaiyai Thottaal, Adhu Kalleriyundu, Alladhu Ambinaal Eyyundu Saagavendumendru Sollappatta Kattalaiyai Sagikkamaattaadhirundhaargal.
21 moseyum: Naan Migavum Bayandhu Nadungugiren Endru Sollaththakkadhaaga Andha Kaatchi Avvalavu Bayangaramaayirundhadhu.
22 neengalo Seeyon Malaiyinidaththirkum, Jeevanulla Dhevanudaiya Nagaramaagiya Parama Erusaleminidaththirkum, Aayiram Padhinaayiramaana Dhevadhoodhargalinidaththirkum,

23 paralogaththil Perezhudhiyirukkira Mudharperaanavargalin Sarvasangamaagiya Sabaiyinidaththirkum, Yaavarukkum Niyaayaadhibadhiyaagiya Dhevanidaththirkum, Pooranaraakkappatta Needhimaangaludaiya Aavigalinidaththirkum,

24 pudhu Udanpadikkaiyin Maththiyastharaagiya Yesuvinidaththirkum, Aabelinudaiya Raththam Pesinadhaippaarkkilum Nanmaiyaanavaigalai Pesugira Raththamaagiya Thelikkappadum Raththaththinidaththirkum Vandhu Serndheergal.

25 pesugiravarukku Neengal Sevikodukkamaattomendru Vilagaadhapadi Echcharikkaiyaayirungal; Enenil, Boomiyile Pesinavarukku Sevikodukkamaattomendru Vilaginavargal Thappippogaamalirukka, Paralogaththilirundhu Pesugiravarai Naam Vittuvilaginaal Eppadith Thappippovom?
26 avarudaiya Saththam Appozhudhu Boomiyai Asaiyappannitru; Innum Orudharam Naan Boomiyai Maaththiramalla, Vaanaththaiyum Asaiyappannuvenendru Ippozhudhu Vaakkuththaththanseydhirukkiraar.
27 innum Orudharam Engira Sollaanadhu Asaiyaadhavaigal Nilaiththirukkaththakkadhaaga, Asaivullavaigal Undaakkappattavaigalpol Maarippom Enbadhai Kurikkiradhu.
28 aadhalaal, Asaivillaadha Raajyaththai Perugiravargalaagiya Naam Bayaththodum Bakthiyodum Dhevanukku Piriyamaai Aaraadhanai Seyyumpadi Kirubaiyai Patrikkollakkadavom.
29 nammudaiya Dhevan Patchikkira Akkiniyaayirukkiraare.
